name: domusto-marantz
description: DOMUSTO home automation plugin for Marantz AVR devices

scripts.build-esm: rm -rf target/main/esm && npx tsc -p tsconfig-esm.json && npx rollup target/main/esm/index.js -o target/main/esm/fesm.js
scripts.build-all: npm run build-cjs && npm run build-esm

author: Bas van Dijk
